item.title: Binance Alpha's new airdrop PROVE will launch on August 5th
item.description: On August 4th, Binance Alpha is set to become the first platform to list Succinct (PROVE) on August 5th. Once Alpha trading commences, eligible users can access the Alpha event page to claim an airdrop by using Binance Alpha Points. Further details will be provided at a later time.

item.title: pump.fun's circulating supply in the last 24 hours has only been 21.43% of LetsBONK, causing its market share to drop to 22.2%.
item.description: On August 4th, based on Jup.ag data, within the past 24 hours, the token supply of pump.fun reached 3,515 (with a bonded rate of 0.34%), while the token supply of LetsBONK reached 16,399 (with a bonded rate of 1.07%).The market share of pump.fun has declined to 22.2%, and LetsBONK has achieved a market share of 67%.

item.title: Binance will support the Sei (SEI) network upgrade
item.description: On August 4th, as per an official announcement, Binance will halt the deposit and withdrawal of Sei (SEI) tokens on its network at 7:00 (UTC+8) on August 5th, 2025 in order to support a network upgrade and guarantee the best user experience.The network upgrade will occur at block height 160,945,710 and is approximately at 8:00 on August 5th, 2025.Once the upgraded network becomes stable, the token deposit and withdrawal services on the mentioned network will be resumed. No additional announcements will be made at that time.

item.title: QCP: Bitcoin Hit by Three Consecutive Friday Sell-Offs, But Overall Structural Uptrend Remains Intact
item.description: On August 4th, QCP released its daily market analysis, stating that Bitcoin witnessed a sell-off for the third consecutive Friday. The price briefly tested the $112,000 support level. Since last Friday, this has triggered more than $1 billion in leveraged long liquidations across the entire market. This rapid drop took place against the backdrop of rising "risk-off sentiment" in traditional markets, mainly due to factors such as below-expected US employment data and Washington's new round of tariff policies. These factors have led to a simultaneous decline in both the US stock market and the crypto market as investors reassess the global growth and liquidity outlook.Despite the market pullback, the overall structural uptrend has not been broken. Bitcoin's July monthly closing price set a new all-time high, and this decline seems more like a corrective retracement rather than a capitulatory sell-off. Based on historical experience, such pullbacks often squeeze out excessive leverage a

item.title: Gyroscope Dynamic Liquidity Pool Goes Live on Avalanche, Excels in Subsequent Performance, AVAX/USDC Pool Tops APY
item.description: On August 4th, Gyroscope Twitter has put out a post-event liquidity pool performance report regarding Avalanche. Based on the official Gyroscope data, as of the latest statistics, its AVAX/USDC Dynamic E-CLP deployed on Avalanche has attained an annualized Swap Fee / TVL APY of 97%, surpassing multiple similar pools:路 Gyro Dynamic E-CLP (30bp fee): 97%路 LFJ (20bp): 23%路 LFJ (7.5bp): 62%路 Pharaoh (7bp): 59%Compared to other low-fee, concentrated liquidity pools, the Dynamic E-CLP adopts a broader liquidity distribution range. While reducing the Impermanent Loss (IL) risk, it still achieves leading yield performance.As was previously reported, Gyroscope deployed the Dynamic E-CLP to Avalanche at the end of July and launched liquidity incentives for the AVAX/USDC and GYD trading pairs. This earnings data validates the competitiveness of its strategy.

item.title: WEEX Exchange Announces the Launch of ASM and LUCKYMOON Spot Trading
item.description: On August 4th, WEEX made an announcement. It was stated that Alpha Synbo Meme (ASM) and Black Unicorn corp (LUCKYMOON) have recently been listed in the platform's spot trading area for the first time. Additionally, WEEX's spot trading is about to list X-World (XW) and COINSWAP (COIN).Synbo Protocol is a decentralized community capital protocol. It connects early-stage projects with community users in a seamless manner through an efficient, transparent, and fair CCO consensus distribution and a 1.5-level trading mechanism. ASM is a MEME coin operating on the Binance Smart Chain Alpha version and enjoys exclusive mainnet token airdrops and early community equity and other benefits. Black Unicorn corp (LUCKYMOON) is a global holding company that develops smart solutions for the crypto ecosystem.

item.title: DAU Surpasses Solana for the First Time on August 2
item.description: On August 4th, according to the monitoring of @EmberCN, the daily active users on the Sei Network exceeded those of the Solana Network for the first time on August 2nd.Recently, Sei has launched native USDC, introduced Ondo and Backpack. A large number of adoptions have led to a doubling of Sei's daily active users in the past 3 months, from 380,000 to the current 752,000.In addition, within just 10 days, the total supply of native USDC on Sei has reached $108 million, surpassing chains such as zkSync, Algorand, Polkadot and others.

item.title: CloneX 24-hour Trading Volume Surges by 70%, Floor Price Rises to 0.3775 ETH
item.description: On August 4th, according to Nftscan data, the NFT project CloneX experienced a 70% increase in 24-hour trading volume, reaching 53.2 ETH. Its floor price rose to 0.3775 ETH, with a 24-hour growth of 18.01% and a 7-day growth of 38.79%. The 24-hour transaction count surged by 213.33% and reached 141 transactions.

item.title: Binance will list TOWNS on August 5th
item.description: August 4th. As per the official announcement, Binance will list TOWNS on August 5th, 2025, at 22:30 (UTC+8) and commence trading pairs involving USDT, USDC, BNB, FDUSD, and TRY, adhering to the seed tag trading rule.The TOWNS deposit channel will open on August 4th, 2025, at 19:00 (UTC+8). It should be noted that TOWNS will be launched and traded within the Binance Alpha event (with a separate announcement regarding the time). However, once spot trading is initiated, TOWNS will no longer be featured on Binance Alpha.

item.title: Binance HODLer Airdrop Launch of Towns (TOWNS)
item.description: On August 4th, the Binance HODLer Airdrop is going to initiate Towns (TOWNS).
